data.name: Barbarian Riftcutter
data.oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice Barbarian Riftcutter: Destroy target land.
data.flavor_text:
"Riftcutters are suicidal anarchists, waving those lightning axes around so much that the walls are as likely to fall as their foes."
—Heruj, Selesnya initiate

data.name: Blockbuster
data.oracle_text: {1}{R}, Sacrifice Blockbuster: Blockbuster deals 3 damage to each tapped creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: Vendors hung cords heavy with roots and laid out boxes of salted meat, unaware of the fiery disaster swiftly approaching.

data.name: Bloodscale Prowler
data.oracle_text: Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
data.flavor_text: It tracks its victims by the scent of their breath, preferring to dine on those who recently ate well.

data.name: Breath of Fury
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature you control
When enchanted creature deals combat damage to a player, sacrifice it and attach Breath of Fury to a creature you control. If you do, untap all creatures you control and after this phase, there is an additional combat phase.

data.name: Cackling Flames
data.oracle_text:
Cackling Flames deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Hellbent — Cackling Flames deals 5 damage to that creature or player instead if you have no cards in hand.
data.flavor_text:
"I like a little entertainment with my dinner."
—Rakdos

data.name: Char
data.oracle_text: Char deals 4 damage to target creature or player and 2 damage to you.
data.flavor_text: Izzet mages often acquire their magic reagents from dubious sources, so the potency of their spells is never predictable.

data.name: Cleansing Beam
data.oracle_text: Radiance — Cleansing Beam deals 2 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
data.flavor_text:
"Justice is toothless without punishment. Righteousness cannot succeed without the suffering of the guilty."
—Razia

data.name: Coalhauler Swine
data.oracle_text: Whenever Coalhauler Swine is dealt damage, it deals that much damage to each player.
data.flavor_text: Nothing stops industry in Ravnica—certainly not the safety of its workers.

data.name: Demonfire
data.oracle_text:
Demonfire deals X damage to target creature or player. If a creature dealt damage this way would die this turn, exile it instead.
Hellbent — If you have no cards in hand, Demonfire can't be countered by spells or abilities and the damage can't be prevented.

data.name: Dogpile
data.oracle_text: Dogpile deals damage to target creature or player equal to the number of attacking creatures you control.
data.flavor_text: There is no shelter from this storm, its rain of fists, or the thunderous cackles of bloodlust.

data.name: Excruciator
data.oracle_text: Damage that would be dealt by Excruciator can't be prevented.
data.flavor_text:
"Though used as a piercing weapon, the tusk is more akin to a stinger, spreading pain instantly throughout the body of its victim. This specimen deserves further study."
—Simic research notes

data.name: Fencer's Magemark
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Creatures you control that are enchanted get +1/+1 and have first strike.
data.flavor_text:
"The first blow is the most important. It often negates the need for a second."
—Agrus Kos

data.name: Fiery Conclusion
data.oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast Fiery Conclusion, sacrifice a creature.
Fiery Conclusion deals 5 damage to target creature.
data.flavor_text: The Boros legionnaire saw a noble sacrifice, the Rakdos thug a blazing suicide, and the Izzet alchemist an experiment gone awry.

data.name: Flame Fusillade
data.oracle_text: Until end of turn, permanents you control gain "{T}: This permanent deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
data.flavor_text:
"A single item acting as lantern and lance? Now that's military efficiency."
—Brev Grezar, Boros lieutenant

data.name: Flame-Kin War Scout
data.oracle_text: When another creature enters the battlefield, sacrifice Flame-Kin War Scout. If you do, Flame-Kin War Scout deals 4 damage to that creature.
data.flavor_text:
"The forward flame-kin are popping. We have incoming!"
—Svar, Boros signaler

data.name: Flaring Flame-Kin
data.oracle_text: As long as Flaring Flame-Kin is enchanted, it gets +2/+2, has trample, and has "{R}: Flaring Flame-Kin gets +1/+0 until end of turn."
data.flavor_text: A flame-kin is always formidable, but feeding its fire with a sorcerous gift grants it the power to devastate armies.

data.name: Flash Conscription
data.oracle_text: Untap target creature and gain control of it until end of turn. That creature gains haste until end of turn. If {W} was spent to cast Flash Conscription, the creature gains "Whenever this creature deals combat damage, you gain that much life" until end of turn.

data.name: Frenzied Goblin
data.oracle_text: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.
data.flavor_text: The upside to not thinking about the consequences is that you'll always surprise those who do.

data.name: Galvanic Arc
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
When Galvanic Arc enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
Enchanted creature has first strike.

data.name: Ghor-Clan Bloodscale
data.oracle_text:
First strike
{3}{G}: Ghor-Clan Bloodscale gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate this ability only once each turn.
data.flavor_text: At mealtimes, the Gruul customarily omit such niceties as using forks or killing the entrée.

data.name: Gnat Alley Creeper
data.oracle_text: Gnat Alley Creeper can't be blocked by creatures with flying.
data.flavor_text: Despite its diminutive name, Gnat Alley is the longest street in Ravnica. Mile after twisting mile, it threads its way among the broader, safer thoroughfares like a parasite.

data.name: Goblin Fire Fiend
data.oracle_text:
Haste
Goblin Fire Fiend must be blocked if able.
{R}: Goblin Fire Fiend gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

data.name: Goblin Spelunkers
data.oracle_text: Mountainwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Mountain.)
data.flavor_text: Chimney sweeps, explorers of abandoned buildings, spire climbers . . . goblin spelunkers have found countless niches within Ravnica's metropolis.

data.name: Greater Forgeling
data.oracle_text: {1}{R}: Greater Forgeling gets +3/-3 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Few have seen the inner workings of Ravnica's furnaces, but neighboring districts catch brief glimpses in the horrors that escape the flames.

data.name: Hammerfist Giant
data.oracle_text: {T}: Hammerfist Giant deals 4 damage to each creature without flying and each player.
data.flavor_text:
"Oh sure, they buy a lot of ale, but I always find myself needing to rebuild after the giants have paid a visit."
—Belko, owner of Titan's Keg tavern

data.name: Hunted Dragon
data.oracle_text:
Flying, haste
When Hunted Dragon enters the battlefield, target opponent creates three 2/2 white Knight creature tokens with first strike.
data.flavor_text: The knights see a mighty quarry. The dragon sees breakfast, lunch, and dinner.

data.name: Hypervolt Grasp
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals 1 damage to target creature or player."
{1}{U}: Return Hypervolt Grasp to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: Zap on. Zap off.

data.name: Ignorant Bliss
data.oracle_text: Exile all cards from your hand face down. At the beginning of the next end step, return those cards to your hand, then draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"A quick step beyond oblivion lies a place so full of thoughts that it leaves no room for your own."
—Quyzl, chronarch prodigy

data.name: Incite Hysteria
data.oracle_text: Radiance — Until end of turn, target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain "This creature can't block."
data.flavor_text:
"The Boros say they want to bring order to Ravnica. Funny then, how well they use chaos."
—Trigori, Azorius senator

data.name: Indentured Oaf
data.oracle_text: Prevent all damage that Indentured Oaf would deal to red creatures.
data.flavor_text: All it knows is the difference between friend and food.

data.name: Instill Furor
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature has "At the beginning of your end step, sacrifice this creature unless it attacked this turn."
data.flavor_text:
"The Rakdos know little of technology, but they definitely know how to push buttons."
—Trivaz, Izzet mage

data.name: Kill-Suit Cultist
data.oracle_text:
Kill-Suit Cultist attacks each combat if able.
{B}, Sacrifice Kill-Suit Cultist: The next time damage would be dealt to target creature this turn, destroy that creature instead.
data.flavor_text: Dressed to kill.

data.name: Kindle the Carnage
data.oracle_text: Discard a card at random. If you do, Kindle the Carnage deals damage equal to that card's converted mana cost to each creature. You may repeat this process any number of times.
data.flavor_text: "Start knockin' heads, boys, and don't stop 'til the ragamuffyn sings!"

data.name: Leyline of Lightning
data.oracle_text:
If Leyline of Lightning is in your opening hand, you may begin the game with it on the battlefield.
Whenever you cast a spell, you may pay {1}. If you do, Leyline of Lightning deals 1 damage to target player.
data.flavor_text: Where storm and spellcraft converge.

data.name: Living Inferno
data.oracle_text: {T}: Living Inferno deals damage equal to its power divided as you choose among any number of target creatures. Each of those creatures deals damage equal to its power to Living Inferno.

data.name: Mindmoil
data.oracle_text: Whenever you cast a spell, put the cards in your hand on the bottom of your library in any order, then draw that many cards.
data.flavor_text:
"My criticism of the Izzet is that their impulse for learning seems too much like impulse and too little like learning."
—Trigori, Azorius senator

data.name: Molten Sentry
data.oracle_text: As Molten Sentry enters the battlefield, flip a coin. If the coin comes up heads, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 5/2 creature with haste. If it comes up tails, Molten Sentry enters the battlefield as a 2/5 creature with defender.
data.flavor_text: Some take after their father, Stone, some after their mother, Fire.

data.name: Ogre Gatecrasher
data.oracle_text: When Ogre Gatecrasher enters the battlefield, destroy target creature with defender.
data.flavor_text: A popular game among ogres is to see how many revolutions a head can make before it pops off.

data.name: Ogre Savant
data.oracle_text: When Ogre Savant enters the battlefield, if {U} was spent to cast Ogre Savant, return target creature to its owner's hand.
data.flavor_text: He's an oxymoron.

data.name: Ordruun Commando
data.oracle_text: {W}: Prevent the next 1 damage that would be dealt to Ordruun Commando this turn.
data.flavor_text: Thick of muscle, stout of heart, and possessing a burning love of justice and the battlefield, the Ordruun minotaurs are the foundation of the Boros Legion.

data.name: Parallectric Feedback
data.oracle_text: Parallectric Feedback deals damage to target spell's controller equal to that spell's converted mana cost.
data.flavor_text: "You can't have so many people living so close together, all practicing so much magic, and not expect some feedback."

data.name: Psychotic Fury
data.oracle_text:
Target multicolored creature gains double strike until end of turn.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text:
"Rage, my servants. Our ancient power is renewed in blood."
—Rakdos

data.name: Pyromatics
data.oracle_text:
Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Pyromatics deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

data.name: Rabble-Rouser
data.oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 1 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with a +1/+1 counter on it.)
{R}, {T}: Attacking creatures get +X/+0 until end of turn, where X is Rabble-Rouser's power.

data.name: Rain of Embers
data.oracle_text: Rain of Embers deals 1 damage to each creature and each player.
data.flavor_text: There's plenty to talk about in the marketplaces of Ravnica, be it the latest feud between guilds or the terrible weather.

data.name: Rakdos Pit Dragon
data.oracle_text:
{R}{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gains flying until end of turn.
{R}: Rakdos Pit Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.
Hellbent — Rakdos Pit Dragon has double strike as long as you have no cards in hand.

data.name: Reroute
data.oracle_text:
Change the target of target activated ability with a single target. (Mana abilities can't be targeted.)
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Three hundred years of practice thwarted by an instant of mischief.

data.name: Sabertooth Alley Cat
data.oracle_text:
Sabertooth Alley Cat attacks each combat if able.
{1}{R}: Creatures without defender can't block Sabertooth Alley Cat this turn.
data.flavor_text: It has eight lives' worth of hunger to satisfy.

data.name: Sandstorm Eidolon
data.oracle_text:
{R}, Sacrifice Sandstorm Eidolon: Target creature can't block this turn.
Whenever you cast a multicolored spell, you may return Sandstorm Eidolon from your graveyard to your hand.

data.name: Scorched Rusalka
data.oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice a creature: Scorched Rusalka deals 1 damage to target player.
data.flavor_text: Each small blaze she sets jogs her memory, letting her piece together the mystery of her own fiery end.

data.name: Seal of Fire
data.oracle_text: Sacrifice Seal of Fire: Seal of Fire deals 2 damage to target creature or player.
data.flavor_text:
"If it breathes, it will burn."
—Rakdos pyromancers' creed

data.name: Seismic Spike
data.oracle_text: Destroy target land. Add {R}{R} to your mana pool.
data.flavor_text: Natural disasters in Ravnica are largely nullified by the Izzet. Unnatural disasters, on the other hand, happen all of the time.

data.name: Sell-Sword Brute
data.oracle_text: When Sell-Sword Brute dies, it deals 2 damage to you.
data.flavor_text: "Killing is easy. Just wrap your hand around the haft, and wrap your enemy around the blade."

data.name: Shattering Spree
data.oracle_text:
Replicate {R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Destroy target artifact.

data.name: Siege of Towers
data.oracle_text:
Replicate {1}{R} (When you cast this spell, copy it for each time you paid its replicate cost. You may choose new targets for the copies.)
Target Mountain becomes a 3/1 creature. It's still a land.

data.name: Skarrgan Firebird
data.oracle_text:
Bloodthirst 3 (If an opponent was dealt damage this turn, this creature enters the battlefield with three +1/+1 counters on it.)
Flying
{R}{R}{R}: Return Skarrgan Firebird from your graveyard to your hand. Activate this ability only if an opponent was dealt damage this turn.

data.name: Smash
data.oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact.
Draw a card.
data.flavor_text: Ravnica's laws protect not its citizens but its industry. Aging equipment is destroyed rather than restored, to bring more money into the factories' coffers.

data.name: Sparkmage Apprentice
data.oracle_text: When Sparkmage Apprentice enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
data.flavor_text: Pajik was amazed and pleased at his newfound powers. His pet cat Rivin was slightly less enthusiastic.

data.name: Squealing Devil
data.oracle_text:
Fear (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or black creatures.)
When Squealing Devil enters the battlefield, you may pay {X}. If you do, target creature gets +X/+0 until end of turn.
When Squealing Devil enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless {B} was spent to cast it.

data.name: Stalking Vengeance
data.oracle_text:
Haste
Whenever another creature you control dies, it deals damage equal to its power to target player.
data.flavor_text: Something roams the killing places, sniffing the guilt of the slayers, stalking them on iron paws.

data.name: Stoneshaker Shaman
data.oracle_text: At the beginning of each player's end step, that player sacrifices an untapped land.
data.flavor_text: There is no place in Ravnica for stagnation, no room for lands unfilled and untilled.

data.name: Stormscale Anarch
data.oracle_text: {2}{R}, Discard a card at random: Stormscale Anarch deals 2 damage to target creature or player. If the discarded card was multicolored, Stormscale Anarch deals 4 damage to that creature or player instead.

data.name: Surge of Zeal
data.oracle_text: Radiance — Target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it gain haste until end of turn.
data.flavor_text:
"If only my poxes were as infectious as their zealotry."
—Savra

data.name: Taste for Mayhem
data.oracle_text:
Enchant creature
Enchanted creature gets +2/+0.
Hellbent — Enchanted creature gets an additional +2/+0 as long as you have no cards in hand.
data.flavor_text: The taste of blood breaks down what little self-control the Rakdos possess.

data.name: Tin Street Hooligan
data.oracle_text: When Tin Street Hooligan enters the battlefield, if {G} was spent to cast Tin Street Hooligan, destroy target artifact.
data.flavor_text: "Rauck-Chauv's like a holiday! Only it isn't on the calendars, and instead of dancing you knock people flat, and instead of giving gifts you break stuff."

data.name: Torpid Moloch
data.oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Sacrifice three lands: Torpid Moloch loses defender until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Market hucksters sell molochs for use as watchdogs. Of course, that's all molochs do. Sit around . . . and watch.

data.name: Utvara Scalper
data.oracle_text:
Flying
Utvara Scalper attacks each combat if able.
data.flavor_text: He wages war wherever the wind carries him.

data.name: Viashino Fangtail
data.oracle_text: {T}: Viashino Fangtail deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
data.flavor_text:
"When the bony terminus gets too large, it's shed from the tail in coinciding periods of heightened aggression and hunger."
—Simic research notes

data.name: Viashino Slasher
data.oracle_text: {R}: Viashino Slasher gets +1/-1 until end of turn.
data.flavor_text: Citizens of Ravnica stick to the main streets. Shortcuts may look tempting, but down each alley, dozens of hungry hands await, and screams do not carry into the busy market throng.

data.name: Warp World
data.oracle_text: Each player shuffles all permanents he or she owns into his or her library, then reveals that many cards from the top of his or her library. Each player puts all artifact, creature, and land cards revealed this way onto the battlefield, then does the same for enchantment cards, then puts all cards revealed this way that weren't put onto the battlefield on the bottom of his or her library.

data.name: War's Toll
data.oracle_text:
Whenever an opponent taps a land for mana, tap all lands that player controls.
If a creature an opponent controls attacks, all creatures that opponent controls attack if able.
data.flavor_text: Razia, archangel of war, demands total commitment.

data.name: War-Torch Goblin
data.oracle_text: {R}, Sacrifice War-Torch Goblin: War-Torch Goblin deals 2 damage to target blocking creature.
data.flavor_text:
"In a town shaped by the subtle machinations and political intrigue of its guilds, it's reassuring to see a goblin waving his torch and screaming about some nonsense or other."
—Agrus Kos

data.name: Weight of Spires
data.oracle_text: Weight of Spires deals damage to target creature equal to the number of nonbasic lands that creature's controller controls.
data.flavor_text:
"Finally, a good use for an Azorius courthouse."
—Ghut Rak, Gruul guildmage

data.name: Whiptail Moloch
data.oracle_text: When Whiptail Moloch enters the battlefield, it deals 3 damage to target creature you control.
data.flavor_text:
"It wags its tail when it's happy. It wags its tail when it's angry. Nope, there's no good time to be around a whiptail."
—Rugar, Leaguehall Infirmary patient

data.name: Wojek Embermage
data.oracle_text: Radiance — {T}: Wojek Embermage deals 1 damage to target creature and each other creature that shares a color with it.
data.flavor_text: "Your brother's crimes are your crimes. You stood by and lent support, so you too must face judgment."
